pr_title: Show in Main and Grid view that a Notice/Comment is available #7089

timeline.message:
Add field `JSONViewRow.HasComments`

If true this record has at least a comment
If false or missing this row does not have any comments

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/7089

Grid view: Add `JSONViewRow.hasComments` and set it using data from CommentsService

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/7089

Single view: Add `JSONDocument.hasComments` and set it using data from CommentsService

For single view we are interested in RootDocuments only.

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/7089
#7089 remove the notification dot from the header dropdown
#7089 fix setting `hasComments` value in the store on saving

`DocumentDescriptorFactory` throws error when creating TableRecordReference from String

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/7089

`CommentsService`: receive DocumentPath when creating or listing the Comments

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/7089
